org.ehcache.impl.serialization

Class CharSerializer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ehcache.impl.serialization.CharSerializer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializer<java.lang.Character>

    public class CharSerializer
extends java.lang.Object
implements Serializer<java.lang.Character>
    Default Serializer for Char type. Simply writes the char value to a byte buffer.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CharSerializer()
      No arg constructor
      CharSerializer(java.lang.ClassLoader classLoader)
      Constructor to enable this serializer as a transient one.

      Reconstructs an instance from the given serial form.

      • CharSerializer

        public CharSerializer()
        No arg constructor

      • CharSerializer

        public CharSerializer(java.lang.ClassLoader classLoader)
        Constructor to enable this serializer as a transient one.

        Parameter is ignored as Character is a base java type.

        classLoader - the classloader to use
